title: Free Apartment Finding Service!
posting_body: Hey there, Jeff here with Rental Friends - a real estate company and apartment location service.
I have helped thousands of people look for and find great places to live over the past 15 years.
I work with TONS of apartments and lofts downtown from the River North (RINO) area to City Park, Cherry Creek,  highlands/lohi and Cap Hill down to Englewood.
I know where some great deals are!
I have a GREAT deal in Lodo - 800 sq feet with a 1 bed right at 1810 with w/d in the unit~!
My service is totally free if you are looking for a place, (I get a referral fee from the owners of the props) so it is a great resource for you for free.
